name: Oracle Mountain
description:
Oracle Mountain is known for its terrifying height. Good thing you're about to climb it.

After economic devastation and anarchy, people formed their own gangs in order to survive in the wasteland. One of your gang members got a tip that a rival gang has stashed a hidden selection of supplies on top of Oracle Mountain...

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was made for the "I Can't Draw But I Want To Make A Game" Jam. It took about 10 - 11 days to make. I hope you enjoy it!

This game really helped me get out of a rut, so I am kinda proud of the results. Thank you to the community running the Jam for helping me stay on track!

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Anyonebacon
